question:
Consider the following statements:
  1. Cartosat-2 is a micro satellite which aims to facilitate weather forecasting & cyclone prediction
  2. ScatSat-1 is an earth observation satellite in a sun-synchronous orbit
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: <u>First statement is incorrect</u> because Cartosat-2 is an earth observation satellite in a sun-synchronous orbit. Second <u>statement is incorrect</u> because ScatSat-1 is a micro satellite which aims to facilitate weather forecasting & cyclone prediction.
